_header: This ender day I met a clerk
_description: Complaint of a betrayed maiden — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: A dere god qwat I am fayn / For I am madyn now gane

CamStJohn259.First Lines:
Þis euery day I mete a clerkeAnd he was wylly in hys
                    werke…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines:
…Now wyll I not lete for no iageWith no clerk for to
                    pley
